website_summaries.verdict: While some claim that the wide variety of models available make it a toss-up as to what you’ll actually receive, the price is amazingly low given the quality and features.
pros: Comes with a lot of features and settings
Easy to install, with or without its enclosed flow restrictor
cons: Suffers a bit in durability due to its plastic construction
Some buyers say they received a different model than the one they ordered

customer_reviews.title: Good, double function shower head
customer_reviews.text: This piece came in a small box with protective wrapping around the shower head as well as bubble wrap. It was super simple to install, though I didn't notice a change in water pressure, it seems to last longer without the water pressure lowering between cleansing. The waterfall feature is something I'd never experienced before and is quite neat, but I prefer the regular shower feature instead. It's a good, wide range that the water sprays out and the water pressure is definitely better than what I expected for such a small piece.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good head.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the waterfall is a gimmic and kinda sucks. The regular mode is exactly what I wanted in a shower head. Just rain. It's like being in a spring shower. Most shower heads are tiny and pierce skin with their pressure and the big rainfall ones just have too much spread to be good...this one, at about 5 inches is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My first rain shower head and I love it! I love the added arm because my shower head's neck was already set too low. It does feel cheap, but I've had this in my shower for over 6 months and it still works great. My only complaint is that you have to be very careful with where you start spinning the neck into place because you may find that the shower head is off to the left instead of standing directly over you. I got it pretty close to midline.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼 worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it. Easy to install, even came with tape to prevent leakage. There are 2 settings which I was surprised. Came in a week after purchasing. I am a verified customer with a verified purchase , I gave my honest opinion as i always do & was not oaid for my reivew.

customer_reviews.title: Really does a good job. Looks good. Has two settings. Easy to remove the flow restrictor
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice, compact size. About 5" across. I removed the flow restrictor on mine and as a result this moves a lot of water. There are two buttons on the head itself, one for streaming and the other for a sheet of water the flows from the slit in the shower head. It's a great feature for getting large amounts of soap off quickly. The flow restrictor is under the mesh screen. The screen simply pops out and the restrictor is a small white plastic object. It will be obvious what it is. Once removed, put the mesh screen back in place and you're ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece!!
customer_reviews.text: My old shower head had 5 functions but it broke few days back. I decided to purchase this shower head after reviewing many other shower heads. I wanted a cost effective yet big shower head. The waterfall button is such great idea. I fell in love with this piece as soon as I opened my package. Very easy install and it works like a charm!! I got fully wet in less than 15 secs and had a lovely bath after long while. Kudos to AKDY for such a quality product. Highly recommend to anyone who don't want to waste 50$ like I did last time.

Don't really use the push-button flow option all that much, but it could be good for filling up things with water, or washing off objects. But all-in-all It's nice, no issues or problems after several months of use. Nice product.
